Kingston Negroni

Pin It
Main Spirit Rum - Jamaican
Difficulty Easy
Technique Stirred

What happens when Campari and Italian Vermouth meet the sand and sun of the Caribbean? Well, that would be a Kingston Negroni. Overproof Jamaican Rum stands up to the bombastic chocolate and bitter orange notes in the vermouth while drying out the Camparis richness and tempering its bitterness.

Ingredients

  • 1 oz. 30ml Jamaican Rum (overproof)
  • 1 oz. 30ml Sweet Vermouth
  • 1 oz. 30ml Campari
Display: oz. ml.

Glass

Rocks

Instructions

Combine all ingredients and stir with ice. Strain into an ice-filled rocks glass.

Garnish

Orange Slice

More about this drink

Created in 2009 by Joaqun Sim at New Yorks Pouring Ribbons. He suggests the use of Smith & Cross overproof Jamaican rum.
